animeTitle: My Wife is Playing Spoiled Again
synopsis: The story is that Tang Xiaorou is a young girl who cannot let go of her thoughts. After more than ten years of fascination and torture, Tang Xiaorou once wanted to let go of her marriage, even he took it into his head, but when such a cold and indifferent Mo Ji Cheng took the initiative to come up, she could not help but be moved. Tang Xiaorou and her dark husband have been going back and forth, leaving a ripple in each other's heart for a long time, as if she is destined to not escape from his palm.
